name: @hotwired/turbo-rails
description: The speed of a single-page web application without having to write any JavaScript

scripts.prerelease: yarn build && git --no-pager diff && echo && npm pack --dry-run && echo && read -n 1 -p "Look OK? Press any key to publish and commit v$npm_package_version" && echo
scripts.release: npm publish && git commit -am "$npm_package_name v$npm_package_version" && git push

author: Basecamp, LLC
